basics.name: Gilang Gumilar
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Passionate Software Engineer. Life-long learner. Love to learn many things.

work.summary: Bukalapak is one of the leading online marketplace in Indonesia and a Unicorn company, owned and run by PT. Bukalapak.
highlights: Created Bukalapak's internal dashboard admin for Core Trust and Safety. (Vue.js, VueX, Vuetify, Express.js)
Created Bukalapak's Vue UI Component Library. (Vue.js, Storybook, Jest, SASS)
Maintained Bukalapak's mobile web (Vue.js, VueX), Bukalapak's centralized front-end documentations (Express.js), Bukalapak's front-end data tracking utility (JavaScript).

work.summary: GoriTax is a curated tax and accounting experts as a service.
highlights: Designed the database (SQL, PostgreSQL), created the back-end with a RESTful API (Python, Django, Django REST framework), and created the infrastructure (Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Kops, Gitlab CI/CD).
Created the front-end with a front-end engineer. (ReactJS, Redux, Material-UI)

work.summary: Bukalapak is one of the leading online marketplace in Indonesia and a Unicorn company, owned and run by PT. Bukalapak.
highlights: Rewrote the product detail page on mobile web using Vue.js and Bukalapak's RESTful API. (Vue.js)

work.company: Computer Science Faculty of Universitas Indonesia
work.summary: Assisted the lecturer of Web Design and Programming (International Class) course
highlights: Created weekly lab tutorials with other assistants.

work.summary: Jojonomic provides services that can easily control company expenses with Real Time Approval.
highlights: Developed the web app features using HTML, CSS, JS.

volunteer.summary: freeCodeCamp is a nonprofit organization that consists of an interactive learning web platform, an online community forum, chat rooms, Medium publications, and local organizations that intend to make learning web development accessible to anyone.
highlights: Created several projects to achieve the certification which hosted at https://codepen.io/gilangmlr

volunteer.summary: BETIS (Bimbingan Belajar Gratis) is a free tutoring program from BEM Fasilkom UI for high school students or equivalent to prepare for national college entrance examination (SBMPTN).
